actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide for a full and complete investigation and study by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare of crime and violence in elementary and secondary school, to determine the efficacy of school security programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Safe Schools Study Act - Requires a full and complete investigation and study by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare of crime and violence in elementary and secondary schools. Provides that such study shall include efforts to determine the efficacy of school security programs. Authorizes the appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a full and complete investigation and study by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare of crime and violence in elementary and secondary school, to determine the efficacy of school security programs, and for other purposes.
